8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah, the Mother of the Believers, narrated:"The Messenger of Allah visited me one day and said: 'Do you have anything (to eat)?'" She said: "I said: 'No.' He said: 'Then I am fasting

chapter.eng-name: Performing A Voluntary Fast Without Planning It The Night Before
